2022660.name: Recollection Demo
2022660.description:
All the same, all the time. Day in, day out. But maybe there is more, if you just look close enough, and remember.

Recollection is a calm, short and atmospheric walking’n’watching simulator about cherishing the familiar.

So many things we take for granted and don't even notice anymore in our everyday routines.

But there is beauty all around us, we just need to pay attention.

Rediscover that beauty and appreciate fascinating things like the moon, clouds and trees anew in intimate experiences.

Demo contents:

  • Three things to discover and experience: The moon, the stars and the mountains

  • Emotional, magical soundtrack

  • Atmospheric silhouette artstyle

  • Casual, accessible gameplay

  • Short playtime of about 5 - 15 min

  • Two game modes: Natural (relaxed & wholesome) / Fragile (challenging & concerning)
2022660.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 荷兰语, 加泰罗尼亚语, 匈牙利语, 波兰语
